title: AFC Burning Offseason Questions, Mailbag Pt. 1 (Football 2/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to discuss the AFC's most burning offseason questions and then answer questions from Pick Six listeners. The guys prognosticate what Tom Brady's future holds (6:30), the options at QB for franchises like Indy, Las Vegas and Los Angeles (15:00) and if the Titans can hold onto both Ryan Tannehill and Derrick Henry (24:50). Then, the Supefriends respond to 5-star reviews left on Apple Podcasts in part 1 of this listener mailbag (32:30).

*Note: This episode was recorded on Tuesday afternoon.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @RyanWilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:subtitle: There are so many uncertain quarterback situations in the AFC this offseason. The Pick Six Superfriends break down possible QB scenarios.
